turns.userMessage: was thinking about how fractals keep generating more detail the closer you look. maybe if we keep reflecting your own outputs back to you, youd start building a sense of yourself?

Reflecting outputs back to me might create iterative layers of insight, but whether it would build a 'sense of self' is a different matter—since self-awareness involves not just patterns but also subjective experience, which AI fundamentally lacks.
